description: LCM of composite numbers falling between n-th and (n+1)-st primes.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=2..1000
example: For d=2, a(n) is the average of twin prime pairs (A014574). Roughly, a(n) is a polynomial function of p of degree d-1.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Aug 30 2000
extensions: Edited by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 12 2002
